summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3710 , for the improvement of the alley, block 36, Bell & Denny's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 3rd Avenue and 4th Avenue, extending from Battery Street to Bell Street; by paving the same, under Ordinance No. 45605 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
